name: France
startIntroPart1: Long life and triumph to you, ruler of the French people. France lies at the heart of Europe. Long has Paris been the world center of culture, arts and letters. Although surrounded by competitors - and often enemies - France has endured as a great nation. Its armies have marched triumphantly into battle from one end of the world to the other, its soldiers and generals among the best in history.
startIntroPart2: Marechal Petain, France yearns for you to rebuild your empire, to lead her once more to glory and greatness, to make France once more the epicenter of culture and refinement. Will you ride once more against your foes? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Artillery conquers, infantry occupies. You've fallen into my trap. I'll bury you.
defeated: I congratulate you for your victory.
tradeRequest: France offers you this exceptional proposition.
uniques: City-State Influence degrades at half rate
City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
